name: Unknown Lands
description:
"During one of your endeavours as a nameless space explorer, you strand nearby an
abandoned space station orbiting around an unknown planet. The need for replacement
parts forces you to board the space station but your curiosity keeps you exploring it. Room
by room you find out more about its history, the people who built it and the reasons why
it is located next to this strange planet that presents itself too hot and dry to bear any
form of life."

Controls:

WASD - movement

Space - Jump

E - Spawn Clone/Control Clone/Player

F - Interact with objects
